questions.title: Frequently Asked Questions
questions.description: Find the answers to your questions

items.question: How can I place an order?
items.answer: You can place your order through our website by selecting the products you want and following the checkout process. You can also contact us by phone or WhatsApp.

items.question: What is the delivery time?
items.answer: Delivery time depends on your location. We generally deliver the same day if the order is placed before 12:00 PM, or the next day.

items.question: Do you offer home delivery?
items.answer: Yes, we offer home delivery throughout the city. Shipping costs vary by area. We also offer free delivery for orders that exceed a certain amount.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept cash, debit and credit cards, bank transfers, and payments through Mercado Pago. We also offer cash on delivery.

items.question: Can I customize my floral arrangement?
items.answer: Of course! We love creating customized arrangements according to your preferences. You can choose the types of flowers, colors, and style. Contact us and we'll help you create the perfect arrangement.

items.question: Do you offer event services?
items.answer: Yes, we offer complete services for events such as weddings, birthdays, anniversaries, and corporate events. We work with you to create the perfect floral decoration for your special occasion.

items.question: What if I'm not satisfied with my order?
items.answer: Your satisfaction is our priority. If you are not completely satisfied with your order, contact us within 24 hours of delivery and we will do everything possible to resolve it.

items.question: Do you offer subscriptions or memberships?
items.answer: Yes, we offer different membership plans that allow you to receive regular floral arrangements with exclusive discounts. You can choose from monthly, quarterly, or annual plans depending on your needs.
